biotools.summary: A probabilistic framework to predict the alignment of each transcript fragment to a reference genome for each PER (RNA-seq paired-end read). The alignment chosen is determined by maximizing the likelihood of all PER alignments through an expectation maximization method.

bioschemas.name: PERalign
bioschemas.summary: A probabilistic framework to predict the alignment of each transcript fragment to a reference genome for each PER (RNA-seq paired-end read). The alignment chosen is determined by maximizing the likelihood of all PER alignments through an expectation maximization method.
